endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end date and time of the event or item (in ISO 8601 date format).

numberOfEpisodes.title: Number of Episodes
numberOfEpisodes.description: The number of episodes in this season or series.

position.title: Position
position.description: Free text to define other than pure numerical ranking of an episode or a season in an ordered list of items (further formatting restrictions may apply within particular user groups).

seasonNumber.title: Season Number
seasonNumber.description: Position of the season within an ordered group of seasons.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start date and time of the event or item (in ISO 8601 date format).
